answers.answer: He could have cataracts, corneal disease, inflammation of the eye (iritis), diabetic retina disease, macular swelling, or he could need glasses.It is very important that he see an Eye MD ophthalmologist physician for a complete medical exam. If all is well he needs this done yearly.In the USA find one at www.aao.org   elsewhere ask your family MD for a referral.JCH III MD

question: what is the cause of too brit eye vision?my husbbd have diabetes but controlled. most of the time its 73 to 77. blood pressure most of the time 160/75 to 79 .he has mentainance and it goes down  about 140 lower than that he feels week and trembling. is this the cause of too bright eye sight or other cause?
title: too bright eye sight
